title: New: Liza Flume – Sleepless Nights
body:
Caught some of **Liza Flume’s** set at [Hard Working Class Heroes](hwch.

net) last night, proving pretty much perfectly timed for the release of her latest track, Sleepless Nights. Silky smooth, coming in somewhere between the more intimate moments on Lorde’s Pure Heroine and [Sea Oleena’s](http://seaoleena.bandcamp.com/album/sleeplessness) captivating sound. Check out _Sleepless Nights_ below.

Silky smooth, coming in somewhere between the more intimate moments on Lorde’s Pure Heroine and Sea Oleena’s captivating sound. Check out Sleepless Nights below.
